data.text: @Delta Don’t book a Delta flight through “HoHoFlights” in Columbia, MD, it’s a bait and switch scam

data.text:
⭐️ Delta SkyMiles
Unlike the other major U.S. carriers, the @Delta Air Lines Medallion program remains largely unchanged in the last several years.

TPG valuation: 1.41 cents apiece 
https://t.co/1x2ksthmGF
